title: Learn WordPress for Designers
content:
Did you know‚Ä¶ ü§ì

‚Ä¶Learn WordPress has a dedicated learning path especially for designers?

It gently guides you through blocks, patterns, and the Site Editor, helping you turn creative ideas into real WordPress websites step by step.

title: WordPress and the future of AI
content:
Did you know‚Ä¶ ü§ì

‚Ä¶artificial intelligence is becoming a foundational topic within the WordPress project?

New APIs and standards are being developed to allow AI tools to interact with WordPress in a structured, predictable, and responsible way.

title: WordPress isn‚Äôt just software
content:
Did you know‚Ä¶ ü§ì

‚Ä¶there are large WordPress events around the world where enthusiasts meet and learn from each other?

Conferences like WordCamp Europe, WordCamp US, and WordCamp Asia bring the global WordPress community together in person.

These events feature talks, workshops, and networking opportunities for everyone from beginners to seasoned developers.

title: WordPress powers the open web
content:
Did you know‚Ä¶ ü§ì

‚Ä¶WordPress now powers more than 43% of all websites worldwide, making it the most widely used content management system on the internet?

This scale is the result of nearly two decades of open-source development and a global community continuously improving the platform.

title: WordPress 6.9 ‚ÄúGene‚Äù
content:
WordPress 6.9 is here!

Major upgrades for team collaboration and content creation.

  • Notes feature: Introduces block-level commenting to streamline reviewing and polishing content.
  • Command Palette: Navigation is now faster for power users.
  • Abilities API: Provides a standardized way to open the door for AI-powered and automated workflows.
